features: 11.25 oz pump bottles of Softsoap Warm Vanilla and Coconut Milk Liquid Moisturizing Hand Soap, Liquid Hand Soap and Hand Wash
Softsoap Warm Vanilla & Coconut Milk liquid hand soap is an indulgent scent
Deeply moisturizing soap hydrates dry skin for a soft and smooth feel
Vanilla and coconut hand soap washes away bacteria so you can confidently clean your hands
The label on this Softsoap liquid soap is fun and joyful, you’ll want to show it off
body.description: From the #1 liquid hand soap brand†, Warm Vanilla and Coconut Milk is a Softsoap liquid soap scent with a label that you’ll want to show off on your sink. An indulgent scent, Softsoap Warm Vanilla & Coconut Milk moisturizing hand soap infuses every small moment with joy and warmth while the creamy formula hydrates dry skin, leaving your hands feeling soft and smooth. This liquid hand pump soap effectively washes away bacteria for clean and fresh hands. Feel the joy of clean with Softsoap hand soap! For everyone, every mood, and every sink, Softsoap liquid hand soap is designed to make you joyfully clean. Use this moisturizing soap in the bathroom or the kitchen to uplift every small moment while keeping your hands clean and smooth. This liquid hand soap washes away bacteria and is an effective way to keep hands clean. Plus, this liquid soap is paraben free and formulated without phthalates, and retains skin’s natural moisture, so you can feel good about washing your hands. Enjoy those small moments of joy and get brilliantly clean with Softsoap Warm Vanilla & Coconut Milk Moisturizing Hand Soap. †Based in part on data reported by Nielsen through its Market Track Service for the Liquid Hand Soap Category for the 52 week period ending 1/1/22, for the All Outlet market. Copyright © 2022 Nielsen.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Liquid Hand Soap, Warm Vanilla & Coconut Milk Softsoap Deeply Moisturizing Liquid Hand Soap, Warm Vanilla & Coconut Milk washes away bacteria. The creamy formula hydrates dry skin, leaving your hands feeling soft and smooth. Softsoap is Liquid Hand Soap brand, trusted to clean your hands since 1975. Wash hands with soap and clean running water for 20 seconds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great moisturizer and cleanser
reviews.reviewText: This is great !1. It has a lovely scent !! 2. It is very moisturizing, not drying out hands is part of its formula etc3. Washes very easy and clean4 .Anti-bacterial5. Warm vanilla and coconut milk scentI love it !! It is perfect and easy to use !!It’s very easy and great !6. I use it in shower as well !! It’s easier than a bar of soap .I would suggest trying it !! I think most will love it ! Scent is lovely and is a pleasant pleasure!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Most liquid soaps are watered down. This soap is creamy and leaves your hands moisturized. Plus it smells GREAT. The scent is not overwhelming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great soap with a wonderful fragrance.
reviews.reviewText: I use Softsoap in my bathroom. The soap is gentle and the aromas can be fantastic. However, they keep changing the aromas that they sell. This sounded good so I ordered one as a test. The fragrance was excellent. So I ordered 2 cases which should last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth and smells good
reviews.reviewText: This scent is so nice - Coconut and Vanilla -the soap is so soft. Nice for hands on the winter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells nice, soft on the hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Softsoap Is The Best Hand Soap Ever!
reviews.reviewText: Softsoap is the best hand soap made, period. It actually cleans hands, while leaving the skin very soft, unlike most other hand soaps on the market. Warm vanilla and coconut milk is my favorite Softsoap scent. It is a very pleasant and strong scent that will remain on the hands for a long time, even if they are washed afterward with Dawn dish soap.The only drawback (and the reason for removing 1 star) about the warm vanilla and coconut milk scent is that it is only sold in the 11 ounce pump size. My other favorite Softsoap scent, milk and honey, comes in 50 ounce refill bottles, and that makes that scent much cheaper by the ounce.Colgate-Palmolive Company, if you are reading reviews, please make the warm vanilla and coconut milk Softsoap scent in the 50 ounce refill size, and I will definitely give it 5 stars. However, for anyone looking for a great smelling hand soap, that will leave your hands soft and clean, the warm vanilla and coconut milk scent is the way to go. However, it will cost a little more since it only comes in the 11 ounce pump size. That being said, I highly recommend this warm vanilla and coconut milk scented Softsoap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Coconut Milk Softsoap
reviews.reviewText: This soap is wonderful!!! The price is great!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good
reviews.reviewText: This makes my hands so soft and smells so good.I love this brand of hand soap. I highly recommend

ugh what a let down. i love softsoap and my kiddo liked the warm vanilla and coconut milk scent. received the lavender and shea scent instead. i guess they changed the product and didnt update the listing! yuck. but too much trouble to return it, so now we smell like potpourri.
Washes you thoroughly & the scent is heavenly!
This 6 pack is so great to have easily accessible when you run out! I love the smell too!

I highly recommend. Product is as described. Large bottles. Great scent. Works well. Good value. You can’t go wrong with this purchase. Nice to buy in bulk if you have multiple bathrooms/sinks to keep soap at.
Great smell. Really adds a nice scent when you wash your hands
